verses.name: Genesis 30:15
verses.text: And she said unto her, Is it a small matter that thou hast taken my husband? and wouldest thou take away my son’s mandrakes also? And Rachel said, Therefore he shall lie with thee to night for thy son’s mandrakes.

verses.name: Genesis 30:16
verses.text: And Jacob came out of the field in the evening, and Leah went out to meet him, and said, Thou must come in unto me; for surely I have hired thee with my son’s mandrakes. And he lay with her that night.

verses.name: Genesis 30:17
verses.text: And God hearkened unto Leah, and she conceived, and bare Jacob the fifth son.
